Key Match Events: Vangelis Pavlidis scored Greece's goal on 49 minutes
Pavlidis scored the last-gasp winner in stoppage time
Three Greece goals were disallowed due to offside calls
Pre-Game Insights: Lee Carsley loaded his starting England XI with Jude Bellingham, Phil Foden and Cole Palmer in central areas, Bukayo Saka and Anthony Gordon on the wings
Carsley emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley praised his team’s resilience after coming back from 2-0 down
Carsley’s team could have conceded one or more by the midway point of the first period
Carsley lost Saka to an injury, Noni Madueke coming on
Greece had the balance, the superiority, and were not prepared to accept a draw
Miscellaneous Highlights: George Baldock, the England-born Greece international, drowned in a swimming pool at his home in Athens on Wednesday
The tragedy has devastated everyone connected to the Greece squad
